Папа Нургл открыто показал вам свою любовь. Зачем продоложать покланяться другим богам?
Определенно, у Архитектора Судеб есть особенная судьба для вас. Зачем продолжать покланяться меньшим богам?
Принц Удовольствия показал...интерес к вашим талантам. Почему бы не покланяться её красоте, чем другим богам?
Этот акт очень обрадует того Бога Хаоса, которому вы станете служить, однако 3 остальных посчитают это великим оскорблением.

Конец Близок! До вас дошли новости, что новый Всеизбранный — чемпион Разрушительных Сил — проявил себя в Пустошах Хаоса. Сможет ли этот Всеизбранный принести Конец Времен или падет от рук защитников Мира, всё еще предстоит узнать...
Да-да, пришло время-час для Великого Возвышения!

Всеизбранный [Root.GetFirstName] пал! Интригой либо мечём, но чемпион Тёмных Богов мёртв! Защитники Порядка могут спать спокойно...пока что. Хаос не имеет начала, и поэтому конца\n\n Со временем, другой Всеизбранный начнёт свой поход из Пустошей Хаоса и снова принесет разруху, во имя Тёмных Богов.
[Root.GetTitledFirstName] [Root.GetOnlyDynastyName]! Я даю тебе шанс исполнить свою судьбу и присоединиться к Воинству Хаоса Неделимого. Откажись и я уничтожу тебя.
[From.GetBestName], отказался от [From.GetHerHis] судьбы, служить Разрушительным Силам. [From.GetHerHis] мучения продлятся вечность.
[From.GetBestName], принял [From.GetHerHis] судьбу и вверил [From.PrimaryTitle.GetName] Воинству Хаоса Неделимого.

Всеизбранный, также известный как Лорд Конца Времен, смертный чемпион ради которого объединяются все из Богов Хаоса. Война и смерть, голод и чума, идут по следам этого великого воина, и сама природа противится его присутствию.
Броня Моркара принадлежала Моркару, первому Всеизбранному. Оно делает владельца неуязвимым к любым, кроме самых сильных атак. Это одна из Шести Сокровищ Хаоса, регалия Всеизбранного.

Кованая перед рассветом человечества, Корона Превосходства когда-то держала Око Шириана, но была потеряна для истории. Она поражает в ужас врагов и дает силы своим союзникам. Это одно из Шести Сокровищ Хаоса, регалия Всеизбранного.

Око Шириана было названо в честь чародея - тзничита, который его открыл. Хотя само по себе оно предоставляет пророческие способности носителю, будучи помещенным в Корону Превосходства, его пророческие силы могут в полной мере быть использованны проводником для предсказания и предугадывания нападений противника. Это одно из Шести Сокровищ Хаоса, регалия Всеизбранного.

Убийца Королей был священным клинком Вангела, второго Всеизбранного. Он пленил Великого Демона У'зула в клинок, и тысячи лет тюремного заключения свели демона с ума от ярости. Это одно из Шести Сокровищ Хаоса, регалия Всеизбранного.
Его знают под многими именами "Гхуршай'иш'пхак", "Йронталия",этот демонический конь был украден у демона-принца Аграммона в Царстве Хаоса.Он одно из Шести Сокровищ Хаоса, регалия Всеизбранного

Культ багрового черепа является скрытной организацией, которая внедряется в братства войнов, чтобы превратить их в невольные инструменты Кхорн. Как и любые из кровавых последователей Кхорна, багровые черепа совершают кровавые жертвоприношения и распространяют хаос.

«Дети Погибели» - это тайное общество культистов, которые заявляют, что единственное спасение остается в Нургле, показывая его как фигуру, которая облегчает страдания, а не является причиной этого. Обнимая Нургла, эти культисты считают, что они будут избавлены от самых страшных болезней и выживут в новую эру комфорта и радости.

Из активных культов Хаоса ни один из них не столь силен или амбициозен, как Пурпурная Рука Тзинча. Эта обширная и хорошо связанная организация имеет агентов, разбросанных по всему миру и во всех важных внутренних кругах большинства народов человечества. Они контролируют торговцев, дворян, ремесленников и простолюдинов.

Сибариты - таинственная организация, посвященная исключительно стремлению к изысканному удовольствию и страшной боли во имя Слаанеша. Они полагают, что оба опыта - это лишь отражения одной и той же вещи: предела человеческой выносливости. Сибариты включают в себя членов обоих полов, и они приветствуют всех, от тех кто испытывает лишь легкое любопытство до откровенно развращенных личностей.
The High Magus of the Sybarites.

Один из самых еретических и богохульных культов хаоса из существующих, потерянное и проклятое поклонение всем четырем разрушительным силам. Их структура и ритуалы являются nerieseries те из основных культов, и их демагогическая литургия полна богохульств против Зигмара, Ульрика и других богов Старого света и остального мира .
The High Magus of the Lost and the Damned.

Я ужинаю и много выпиваю с [chaos_cult_recruiter.GetTitledName] сегодня вечером. Это замечательно, но что меня больше всего очаровало-это [chaos_cult_recruiter.GetFirstName] [chaos_cult_recruiter.GetHerselfHimself]. Почему бы мне не прекратить наш разговор, который медленно начал касаться некоторых почти еретических идей, ставя под сомнение мощь [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]?
Вы думаете, что это отличная дискуссия, выпить алкоголя или нет.\n
Никто не должен знать об этом, [chaos_cult_recruiter.GetFirstName].
You would never question the authority of the almighty.\n

Встреча с [chaos_cult_recruit.GetTitledFirstName], я не задумывался о том, чтобы с осторожностью задавать вопрос об абсолютной силе [chaos_cult_recruit.GetHerHis] всемогущего [chaos_cult_recruit.Religion.GetHighGodName] ... К счастью, кажется, что мои тщательно подобранные слова имели желаемый эффект на [chaos_cult_recruit.GetHerHim]. Из блестящих глаз [chaos_cult_recruit.GetHerHis] у меня сложилось четкое впечатление, что [chaos_cult_recruit.GetSheHe] пользовался философским аспектом нашего обращения.

Встреча с [chaos_cult_recruit.GetTitledFirstName], я убедился, что только осторожно сомневаюсь в абсолютной силе [chaos_cult_recruit.Getherhis] всемогущий [chaos_cult_recruit.Religion.GetHighGodName]... К сожалению, кажется, что мои слова только раздражали меня [chaos_cult_recruit.GetRootRelation] — от стилли смотреть [chaos_cult_recruit.GetSheHe] наконец-то мне дали, я, вероятно, следует держаться подальше от [chaos_cult_recruit.GetHerHim] пока.
Я не уверен [chaos_cult_recruit.GetHerHis] чувства были искренними...
Ты до конца своих стремиться набирать §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! в [Root.Society.GetName].\n

Гуляя по столице, парень мой [Root.GetCapitalHolding] ко мне присоединился [chaos_cult_recruiter.GetTitledFirstName]. Я нахожу себя согласным со многими понятиями [chaos_cult_recruiter.GetSheHe] подарки-бесполезность молитвы особенно резонирует со мной. Внезапно [chaos_cult_recruiter.GetSheHe] поворачивается ко мне и прижимает небольшой кожаный чехол в мою руку. "Мой [Root.GetLordLady], вы будете носить это с собой, для защиты?"
Я буду держать его в тайне, и я благодарю вас, [chaos_cult_recruiter.GetFirstName].
Что это? Я должен позвать тебя [chaos_cult_recruiter.GetDWMagician]!

Я договорился о встрече с [From.GetTitledFirstName] на палисадах [From.GetHerHis] [From.GetCapitalHolding] сегодня. [From.GetHerHisCap] лицо загорается, увидев меня, и мы не разговариваем часами. Я предлагаю [From.GetHerHim] заклинание защиты, в кожаной сумке-конечно, я не объясняю содержание... Еще [From.GetSheHe] улыбается, принимая знак.

Я договорился о встрече с [From.GetTitledFirstName] на палисадах [From.GetHerHis] [From.Capital.GetHolding] сегодня. [From.GetHerHisCap] лицо темнеет, когда я снова пытаюсь обсудить мои взгляды на мир. Затем я предлагаю [From.GetHerHim] мое любимое заклинание защиты, куриная нога в кожаной сумке - я думал, что это было достаточно безвредно ,но [From.GetSheHe] отказывается принимать подарок.
[From.GetSheHeCap] просто нужно еще один маленький толчок.
Это было интересно, но я не думаю, что [From.GetSheHe] готов к большему.
Это было потраченное впустую усилие- [From.GetFirstName] заблокирован в [From.GetHerHis] Просмотров.

Что, если я скажу вам, что все, чему вас учили, - это ложь?[chaos_cult_recruiter.GetFirstName] продолжается, бросая осторожный взгляд вокруг нас, прежде чем подтянуть [chaos_cult_recruiter.Getherhis] рукав, раскрывающий шрам в форме [chaos_cult_recruiter.GetDWDevil] ' s Марк. "[Root.Religion.GetHighGodNameCap] - это ложный Бог, только силой [chaos_cult_recruiter.GetDWDevil] реально..."
Вы спрашиваете §Y[chaos_cult_recruiter.GetTitledFirstName]§! как вы можете начать свое путешествие в эти запретные знания.\n
Это богохульство, [chaos_cult_recruiter.GetFirstName]! Сгинь с моих глах, пока я не вызвал охрану!
Вы отклоняете §Y [chaos_cult_recruiter.GetTitledFirstName]§! предложи и притворись, что этого не было.\n

Когда я показал клеймо на моей нижней руке, ожидая, что последний крючок утонет, [от.GetFirstName] пошатнулся назад в шоке и сделал жест рукой для защиты. "Это богохульство, [Root.GetFirstName]" [From.GetSheHe] сказал, раскрыв широко глаза . "Убирайся с глаз моих, пока я не позвал охрану!" [From.GetSheHe] позвал и это было с неохотой, хотя наспех, что я ушел.
Если я не могу повернуть из [From.GetHerHim], никто не может.

Когда я продолжал вырезать клеймо на моей нижней руке, уверен, что последний крючок погрузится под кожу, [From.GetFirstName] резко вдохнул, забеспокоив меня на секунду. "Вы действительно [Root.GetDWMagician] затем "[From.GetSheHe] говорит, жаждет и облегчение. "Можете ли вы помочь мне [From.GetDWReasonToJoin]?" [From.GetSheHe] продолжается, глаза умоляют.
Напишите письмо ковену о §Y[от.GetTitledFirstName]§! введен в должность. [chaos_cult_inductor.GetSocietyRank] §г[chaos_cult_inductor.GetFirstName]§! будет обрабатывать его отсюда.

Мы можем... Если вы предлагаете себя до [chaos_cult_recruiter.GetDWDevil], он предоставит вам полномочия [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] сохранил от нас людей.Кладет кожаный мешочек в карман, я медленно киваю. "О, И я думаю, вам понравится..."[chaos_cult_recruiter.GetSheHe] сказал, с понимающей улыбкой.
Если есть какой-либо шанс, он будет [Root.GetDWReasonToJoin], я.
§Y[chaos_cult_recruiter.GetTitledFirstName]§! оставляет вас в покое - ковен будет в контакте с вами.\n

Прошло некоторое время с [chaos_cult_recruiter.GetTitledFirstName] был в контакте со мной. Я обдумывал [chaos_cult_recruiter.GetPossPronoun] слова. [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] сказал Адаму, что умрет, если съест запретный плод... [Root.Religion.GetHighGodNameCap] лгал. [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle] в [Root.GetHouseOfWorship] ложь.

Прошло некоторое время с [chaos_cult_recruiter.GetTitledFirstName] был в контакте со мной. Я долго размышлял, что [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] подумал бы обо мне, что я углубился в этот путь, но [chaos_cult_recruiter.GetFirstName] уже предложил мне больше поддержки, чем [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] когда-либо. Я начал изучать книги о разрушительных силах, и до сих пор я нахожу мнения, проповедуемые в [Root.GetHouseOfWorship] были узким, в лучшем случае.
Их ложь предназначена, чтобы удерживать нас!
Не могу поверить, что был таким доверчивым.
Я начинаю чувствовать, что я пропал...
Почему мы должны всегда ставить потребности других выше наших собственных...?

Я нашел несколько загадочных каракуль написанных кровью на двери моей спальни сегодня утром. Охранники говорят, что они не видели никого, кто входил в течение ночи, и я не смею спрашивать моего [Root.GetLordSpiritualName], чтобы расшифровать его. Но, кажется, я понимаю.. отметка [chaos_cult_recruiter.GetDWDevl].

Я нашел несколько загадочных каракуль написанных кровью на двери моей спальни сегодня утром. Охранники говорят, что они не видели никого, кто входил в течение ночи, и я не смею спрашивать моего [Root.GetLordSpiritualName], чтобы расшифровать его. Но, кажется, я понимаю.. отметка [chaos_cult_recruiter.GetDWDevil].
Of course, the bargain must be struck!
You carve a pentagram into your arm, just like the one §Y[chaos_cult_recruiter.GetTitledFirstName]§! showed you.\n
You cut your into your arm, a star surrounded by a circle, a symbol from your forbidden studies.
My immortal soul... What if I'm wrong?
You order your servants to scrub the door clean, putting to rest any rumors this could stir up.\n

[Root.GetSisterBrotherCap] [Root.GetFirstName],
We have received word of your dedication and desire to join in the worship of [From.GetDWDevil]. Await the messenger.

Let [From.GetDWDevil] guide you.
Signed, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]
You will be on the look-out for "the messenger".\n

I've met an intriguing [From.GetManWoman] at court. Apparently, this [From.GetFirstName] is a foreign diplomat? I engaged [From.GetHerHim] in conversation for the first time today, and we spoke at length about [Root.GetEducationalTopicPlural]. I was shocked when [From.GetSheHe] carefully pulled up [From.GetHerHis] sleeve, revealing the mark of [From.GetDWDevil].

I've met an intriguing and hypnotically beautiful [From.GetManWoman] at court. Apparently, this [From.GetFirstName] is a foreign diplomat? I engaged [From.GetHerHim] in conversation for the first time today, and we spoke at length about [Root.GetEducationalTopicPlural]. I was shocked when [From.GetSheHe] carefully pulled up [From.GetHerHis] sleeve, revealing the mark of [From.GetDWDevil].

The [chaos_cult_inductor.GetSocietyRank] smiles. "I'm pleased to find you not only an affable [Root.GetManWoman], [Root.GetFirstName], but also one capable of intellectual discourse. The brethren value the pursuit of knowledge and power." [From.GetHerHisCap] smile turns into a grin as [From.GetSheHe] continues: "We'll soon see exactly how committed you are..."
I... What do you need me to do?
§Y[chaos_cult_inductor.GetTitledFirstName]§! offers no reply, instead guiding you to a dilapilated building...

[chaos_cult_inductor.GetFirstName] escorts me to the building. I hesitate upon entering, finding its walls splattered with blood and guts. Several hooded, bloodied figures surround the room, chanting in unison. "KILL FOR KHORNE! KILL FOR KHORNE!"... they want me to murder [khornate_sacrifice.GetBestName]!
Blood for the blood god...BLOOD FOR THE BLOOD GOD!\n

[chaos_cult_inductor.GetFirstName] escorts me to the building. I hesitate upon entering, finding its walls splattered with blood and guts. Several hooded, bloodied figures surround the room, chanting in unison. "KILL FOR KHORNE! KILL FOR KHORNE!"... they want me to murder an innocent lowborn servant!

[chaos_cult_inductor.GetFirstName] escorts me to the building. I hesitate upon entering, a very foul smell coming from inside. Several hooded, dirty and sick-looking figures surround the room, chanting in unison: "Grandpa Nurgle loves us!". [chaos_cult_inductor.GetFirstName] presents me a chalice with a foul looking mixture filling it and says "Drink, drink from Papa Nurgle's sweet gifts!".
You drink from the foul chalice...\n

[chaos_cult_inductor.GetFirstName] escorts me to the building. I hesitate upon entering, the very air crackling with foul energies. Several hooded, deformed figures surround the room, chanting in unison: "Njawrr§thakh §Lzimbarr Tzeentch!". [chaos_cult_inductor.GetFirstName] presents me a small glowing green stone and proclaims "Eat, eat and embrace Change!".

[chaos_cult_inductor.GetFirstName] escorts me to the building. I find myself eager to enter, the inside's sweet aromas and sights arousing my... every sense. Several hooded, voluptuous and statuesque figures surround the room, chanting in unison: "Pain is pleasure! Pleasure is pain!". [chaos_cult_inductor.GetFirstName] pushes me into a soft bed and whispers "Come, lets experience ultimate pleasure!".

[chaos_cult_inductor.GetFirstName] escorts me to the building. I hesitate upon entering, eldricht and blasphemous chants coming from inside. Several hooded figures surround the room, chanting in unison. "Chaos is the only true master!". They want me to murder [undivided_sacrifice.GetBestName], a holy priest of [undivided_sacrifice.Religion.GetHighGodName]!

[chaos_cult_inductor.GetFirstName] escorts me to the building. I hesitate upon entering, eldricht and blasphemous chants coming from inside. Several hooded figures surround the room, chanting in unison. "Chaos is the only true master!". They want me to murder a holy priest of [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]!
I can't do this! I'm a married [Root.GetManWoman]!
You refuse this heretic ritual and try to escape!\n

Когда кровавый ритуал завершен, [chaos_cult_inductor.GetFirstName] поздравляет меня. "Добро пожаловать в [chaos_cult_inductor.GetSocietyName], [Root.GetTitledFirstName]", [chaos_cult_inductor.GetSheHe] сказал, "Теперь ты служитель Бога Черепов".

Когда глупый ритуал завершен, [chaos_cult_inductor.GetFirstName] поздравляет меня." Добро пожаловать в[chaos_cult_inductor.GetSocietyName], [Root.GetTitledFirstName]", [chaos_cult_inductor.GetSheHe] сказал, "Теперь ты в любящих объятьях дядюшки Нургла".

With the eldritch ritual finished, [chaos_cult_inductor.GetFirstName] congratulates me. "Welcome to [chaos_cult_inductor.GetSocietyName], [Root.GetTitledFirstName]", [chaos_cult_inductor.GetSheHe] says, "You're now an asset of the Architect of Fate".

When I wake up the cloaked figures are gone and [satanists_inductor.GetFirstName] is lying next to me, a smile tugging at the corner of [satanists_inductor.GetHerHis] mouth. "Welcome to [satanists_inductor.GetSocietyName], [Root.GetTitledFirstName]", [satanists_inductor.GetSheHe] says, "You're now a servant of the Prince of Pleasure".

With the blasphemous ritual finished, [chaos_cult_inductor.GetFirstName] congratulates me. "Welcome to [chaos_cult_inductor.GetSocietyName], [Root.GetTitledFirstName]", [chaos_cult_inductor.GetSheHe] says, "You're now an servant of the Ruinous Powers".
I wish you had found me sooner.

Bound and gagged, [From.GetTitledFirstName] is carried out of [From.GetHerHis] cell and sacrificed at [Root.GetDWDevil]'s altar. Your acolytes plunge a wicked knife into [From.GetHerHis] heart. [Root.GetDWDevil]! We send you a servant of [From.GetDWDevil]!.

I let go of [chaos_cult_inductor.GetFirstName]'s hand and [chaos_cult_inductor.GetHerHis] smile vanishes. "What are you doing?", the beautiful creature asks. "I'm sorry, [chaos_cult_inductor.GetFirstName]. This is not my path." [chaos_cult_inductor.GetSheHeCap] takes my hand again, but only kisses it gently before turning away. "Only the [chaos_cult_inductor.GetDWDevil] knows. I will remember you, [Root.GetFirstName]." [chaos_cult_inductor.GetSheHeCap] hesitates, before adding: "I think you're special."
[Root.Religion.GetHighGodNameCap] may punish me for it, but I'll remember you, too.
With some help from some of your most loyal guards §Y[chaos_cult_inductor.Society.GetName]§! are discretely escorted away from your [Root.GetCapitalHolding]. "Lost travelers", you explain.\n

My eyes dart wildly around the ungodly scene. The [chaos_cult_inductor.GetSocietyRank] [chaos_cult_inductor.GetFirstName] looks disappointed. My body finally unfreezes and I bolt for the door. "Brothers and sisters, follow [Root.GetHerHim]! [Root.GetFirstName], we can talk about this!" The voice echoes behind me, as I run away. What was I thinking, getting involved in the [Root.GetDWDarkMagic]?! As I flee, panic in my chest, I trip.
[chaos_cult_inductor.Society.GetNameCap] escape from your [Root.GetCapitalHolding].\nYou are injured during the chaos.\n

My eyes dart wildly around the ungodly scene. The evil [chaos_cult_inductor.GetSeductressSeducer] rolls [chaos_cult_inductor.GetHerHis] eyes as I bolt for the door. "Brothers and sisters, see to it that [Root.GetSheHe] doesn't do anything stupid." I don't make it far before I stumble and fall to the floor, a spear sticking out of my chest.
[chaos_cult_inductor.Society.GetNameCap] escape from your [Root.GetCapitalHolding] and you are tragically killed during the chaos.\n

[chaos_cult_inductor.Society.GetNameCap] might not be as bad as I thought, I muse to myself. I sometimes wonder what would have happened had I decided to join them. And I wonder where that beautiful creature went off to. Some ungodly adventure, surely.
My time is better spent far away from them.

[Root.GetDWDevil] has seen your good work, [Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName]
The recruit you sent us, [chaos_cult_recruit.GetTitledFirstName], has now completed [chaos_cult_recruit.GetHerHis] induction into the coven. I thank you for this contribution — it will not be forgotten.

Signed, Grand Master [From.GetFirstName]

§[Root.GetDWDevil] knows what has happened, [Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName]
The recruit you sent us, [chaos_cult_recruit.GetTitledFirstName], has proven to be disaster. We have spent significant resources in our attempt to induct [chaos_cult_recruit.GetHerHim], all for naught. This lack of judgment will be remembered.

Signed, Grand Master [From.GetFirstName]

I am not sure what has happened, but it has been a while since I've had any contact with [chaos_cult_recruiter.GetBestName]. It's disappointing, as I was sort of curious to see where our meetings were going... As I retire tonight, I feel convinced that our time together has somehow ended prematurely.
You will have to await a new recruiter from the clandestine society.

I am not sure what has happened, but it has been a while since I've had any contact with [haos_cult_inductor.GetBestName]. It's disappointing, as I was sort of curious to see where our meetings were going... As I retire tonight, I feel convinced that our time together has somehow ended prematurely.
You will have to await a new recruiter from the clandestine society.
This may have repercussions upon my soul!
This might have repercussions upon my soul!
Попытка выяснить, является ли §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! и работает ли он на мощь Кхорна. Если это так, вы можете пригласить [Root.GetHerHim] стать членом Багровых черепов.
Попытка выяснить, является ли §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! открытым для любви к Нурглу. Если это так, вы можете пригласить [Root.GetHerHim] стать членом Детей погибели.
Попытка выяснить, является ли §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! открытым силе Тзинча. Если это так, вы можете пригласить [Root.GetHerHim], чтобы стать членом Пурпурной руки.
Попытка выяснить, является ли §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! открытым для  излишеств Слаанеша. Если это так, вы можете пригласить [Root.GetHerHim], чтобы стать членом Сибаритов.
Попытка выяснить, является ли §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! открытым для славы Хаоса. Если это так, вы можете пригласить [Root.GetHerHim] стать членом Потерянных и проклятых.
Power: §YChaos Corruption§!\n Влияние [Root.GetDWDevil] заставляет вас, в конце концов, получить черты, мутации или заболевания, связанные с покровителем вашего культа.

Power: §YChaos Corruption§!
 Влияние [Root.GetDWDevil] заставляет вас, в конце концов, получить черты, мутации или заболевания, связанные с покровителем вашего культа.
Power: §YStrenght in Decay§!
 последователи Нургла упиваются болезнью. В то время как они не могут быть излечены от любой серьезной болезни, которую они сокращают, в конечном итоге Господь гниения благословит их нечестивой энергией, которая значительно уравновешивает негативные последствия болезней.

Power: §YStrenght in Decay§!\n Followers of Nurgle revel in disease. While they cannot be cured of any serious disease they contract, eventually the Lord of Decay will bless them with unholy vigour that greatly balances the diseases' negative effects.

To complete this mission, §Gright-click§! on any holding ( or a temple ) in §Y[FromFrom.GetName]§!, select §Y'Desecrate Province'§! and successfully desecrate the land of §Y[FromFrom.GetName]§!.\n Note that depending on the Chaos God your cult worships, the province will get one of 5 different negative modifiers.

The people of [From.GetName] are blind to the power and truth of [Root.GetDWDevil]! Desecrate their temples in the name of our dark patron, so that the whole [From.GetName] recieves the great blessing of [Root.GetDWDevil]! Right-click the title's shield to perform this action.
Desecrate the temples of this province as ordered by §Y[From.Society.GetName]§!.

[Root.GetDWDevil]'s favors, [Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName],

An opportunity to strike at the foolish followers of false gods has presented itself. Their [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle]s in [dw_desecration_target.GetName] are ignorant of the true state of the world. Tear down their idols and desecrate the land in the name of [Root.GetDWDevil]!

[Root.GetDWExpression]
Signed, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]
My forces has breached the outer defenses of [dw_desecration_target.GetName]. I should prepare myself to enter and do the work of [Root.GetDWDevil].

My preparations and plans have been made, the local guard has been bribed to leave a side door of the gates in [dw_desecration_target.GetName]'s walls open so that I and some faithful servants can enter and do the bidding of [Root.GetDWDevil].

With a group of handpicked faithful cultists I have reached [dw_desecration_target.GetName]. However as soon as I step inside the local shrine a [desecration_holder.Religion.GetPriestTitle] throws himself at our feet begging us in the name of [desecration_holder.Religion.GetHighGodName] to show mercy and swears to not utter a word of our presence.
As I and my cadre of faithful cultists reach [dw_desecration_target.GetName] I find no-one other than [desecration_holder.GetTitledFirstName] in the main chapel.

As I and a group of my faithful make our way through the local shrine in [dw_desecration_target.GetName] I spot a [desecration_holder.Religion.GetPriestTitle] tending to their duties in the middle of the night.

As I and a group of my faithful make our way the local shrine in [dw_desecration_target.GetName] I spot a [desecration_holder.Religion.GetPriestTitle] tending to their duties in the middle of the night.
Seize them. Their blood will be a good sacrifice for [Root.GetDWDevil].
Knock them out from behind, they will make for a good sacrifice.
Kill them, dead men tell no tales.
Let them live, if they speak it shall only serve to spread the glory.
Avoid them, no need for the extra risk.

As my brethren approach the [desecration_holder.Religion.GetPriestTitle] they call out for help and grab a nearby candelabra. Within short notice a small group of priests come rushing into the room and a melee breaks out around me.

As my brethren approach the [desecration_holder.Religion.GetPriestTitle] they call out for help and grab a nearby candelabra. Within short notice a small group of priests come rushing into the room and a melee breaks out around me.

Navigating our way through the shrine I and my companions have entered the small room that goes for the inner sanctum. The room contains the sparsest possible honorings to [desecration_holder.Religion.GetHighGodName] and a scant few decorative idols and relics. The state of this place shows clearly the superiority of our cause!

Making our way through the temple I and my companions enter the inner sanctum with its relics and religious idols. A small treasure in both the spiritual and material worlds lies before us. Such a rich and holy place will be most fitting for our dark deeds.

Having penetrated the defenses of the impressive [desecration_holder.GetHouseOfWorship] I and my companions have entered the inner sanctum and are preparing for the desecration ritual. The walls are covered in rich tapestries and holy relics and idols are strewn across the room. It is undoubtedly a place of both wealth and piety, perfect for our cause!
I will take the most expensive relics for myself!
I will use the most sacred in the rites of desecration!
These relics shall be put to better use. My use.
Desecrate them all in the name of [Root.GetDWDevil]!

[Root.GetDWExpression] My faithful and I exit the temple of [dw_desecration_target.GetName] having consecrated the place to Khorne, building a totem of skulls seared in blood. This action will surely attract a local enraged Beastman tribe to [dw_desecration_target.GetName].

[Root.GetDWExpression] My faithful and I exit the temple of [dw_desecration_target.GetName] having consecrated the place to Nurgle... "blessing" the priests' dead corpses with the gifts of the Plaguefather. This action will surely expand into most noxious pox, starting in [dw_desecration_target.GetName].

[Root.GetDWExpression] My faithful and I exit the temple of [dw_desecration_target.GetName] having consecrated the place to Tzeentch. We have covered the floor of the whole building in warpdust. This action will cause all kinds of Tzeentch-blessed mutations amongst [dw_desecration_target.GetName]'s population.

[Root.GetDWExpression] My faithful and I exit the temple of [dw_desecration_target.GetName] having consecrated the place to Slaanesh, turning the temple into a proper den of iniquity. The presence of this... temple of the flesh will surely arouse the population of [dw_desecration_target.GetName] into the darkests delights.

[Root.GetDWExpression] My faithful and I exit the temple of [dw_desecration_target.GetName] having consecrated the place to the Ruinous Powers, turning the temple into a proper shrine to the four Dark Gods. This will please our masters much!

Attempt to use §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! as a host for a [From.GetDWDemon], transforming [Root.GetHisHer] soul and body into that of a servant of [From.GetDWDevil]! This may have repercussions upon your soul!
Enables §Gright-clicking§! the portraits of imprisoned characters, and attempt to summon a Daemon of [Root.GetDWDevil] inside them, in exchange of §Y[Root.GetSocietyCurrency]§!.

Our almighty [Root.GetDWDevil] needs servants in this plane. For some missions, a true [Root.GetDWMagician] is needed. Use §Y[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]§! as a host to summon a servant of [Root.GetDWDevil]!.

To complete this mission, §Gright-click§! on the portrait of §Y[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]§! while [FromFrom.GerSheHe] is your prisoner, select §Y'Daemonic Possession'§! and successfully summon a daemon from inside [FromFrom.GetHerHim].

Greetings, [Root.GetTitledFirstName]

[Root.GetDWDevil] wants new servant in the material plane. Imprison [demonic_possession_mission_target.GetTitledFirstName] and use [demonic_possession_mission_target.GetHerHim] as a host for a daemonic servant of [Root.GetDWDevil].

[Root.GetDWExpression]
Signed, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]

The time has come! [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName] believes our organization has grown strong enough to no longer need to hide in the shadows. It is time to rise against the false gods and profess loyalty to [Root.GetTrueReligionHighGod], standing proud with my [Root.GetTrueReligionAdjective] brothers and sisters!

[From.GetTitledFirstName] has revealed an astounding secret. [From.GetSheHeCap] is a [From.GetTrueReligionAdherent], and [From.GetSheHe] is not alone among the nobility of our realm. I have long held an interest in the practices of [From.GetTrueReligionAdjective] believers, and [From.GetFirstName] has encouraged all those who hold true faith in their heart to profess.
I wish to understand the [From.GetTrueReligionAdjective] faith, but it is still wrong.

At long last, we reap the rewards of our hard work. Any fellow cultist of [Root.GetDWDevil] in our realm willing shall join me in this victory, as we sow [GetDWBrethrenType] in [Root.GetDWDevil]'s name!

All your fellow followers of [Root.GetDWDevil], within your realm, will convert to the worship of [Root.GetDWDevil]. If you are a vassal, and your top liege isn't a member of the cult, you will rebel against them.\n

[From.GetTitledFirstName] has revealed a shocking truth. [From.GetSheHeCap] is a foul servant of [From.Religion.GetHighGodName], and [From.GetSheHe] is not alone among the nobility of our realm. For years they have been influencing the populace to worship their dark master, and there are even places in my own lands where most of the populace grovels before [From.Religion.GetHighGodName]!
How did they keep it secret for so long?

While [From.GetTitledFirstName] has always been a little strange, I never could have known that [From.GetSheHe] was secretly a servant of [From.Religion.GetHighGodName]! Along with a cabal of other nobles in my realm who have been harboring heretical beliefs for years, [From.GetSheHe] has now openly professed to what [From.GetSheHe] dares call 'the true god.'
I cannot allow this heresy to stand!...

While there are only a handful of them, there are a few people in [target_province.GetName] who have heard the call of [Root.GetDWDevil] are willing to attend our rituals. It will take a long time, but they will become true worshippers, and will be able to spread our grand message to ever more new cultists. One day we will rise against the followers of the false gods, in the name of [Root.GetDWDevil]!.

With the passing of [target_province.GetName] from our realm, my brethren and I are finding it to be more challenging than ever to spread the influence of [Root.GetDWDevil] there.\nPeople seemed to be listening, but for now our efforts must be abandoned until we find a new opportunity.

Наши попытки основать ячейку культа [Root.GetSocietyName] в [target_province.GetName] оказалось проще, чем я думал. The populace revels in the [Root.GetDWBrethrenType] of [Root.GetDWDevil], и ,вместе с ростом количества последователей, растёт и наше влияние. У нас появится самостоятельная ячейка даже раньше, чем мы мредполагали.

Наши попытки основать ячейку культистов в [target_province.GetName] достаточно успешны.Количество последователей растёт, а вместе с ним растёт и наше влияние, и люди начинают поклоняться [Root.GetDWDevil]у.

Our effort to establish a cell of cultists in [target_province.GetName] is not working out. The acolytes I have given charge of the operation to are struggling to attract new worshippers, and without growth even some of our early converts are starting to harbor doubts.
I will provide all the support they require.
We should abandon our efforts in [target_province.GetName] for now.

After much work, dedication to [Root.GetDWDevil] and dark deeds, the cell of [Root.GetSocietyName] cultists in [target_province.GetName] has grown far larger than what it once was. Believers in great numbers revel in [Root.GetDWBrethrenType] while ensuring their worship stays hidden from the world. The cell has blossomed into a dark flower, and new brethren find the truth of [Root.GetDWDevil] by the day.

[Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName],

Our cult is growing steadily in the shadows, but for our ultimate goal to rise against the followers of the false gods, we need to have the support of the local populace. You should spread our influence in the lands of [target_province.GetName].

[Root.GetDWExpression],
Signed, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]

The followers of [Root.GetDWDevil] has for too long lurked in the shadows. The time has finally come to rise up against the followers of the false gods, now that we are so many that we can no longer be ignored.

Enables you to openly worship [Root.GetDWDevil]. The other members of the [Root.GetSocietyName] in your realm and counties with cultist communities in the realm will convert with you. This power is available in the Intrigue Screen.

At long last, we will reveal ourselves to the worshippers of the false gods! At long last [Root.GetDWDevil] will give us revenge! Any fellow worshippers willing shall join me in this victory, as I find favour in [Root.GetDWDevil]'s eyes in revealing the corruption which has been going on in our lands.
All your fellow worshippers of [Root.GetDWDevil] in [Root.GetSocietyName], within your realm, will convert to the worship of the true gods!\n

Enables you to spread the influence of [Root.GetDWDevil] secretly among the inhabitants of a county in your realm by right-clicking its county shield in the county view. If you openly become a worshipper of [Root.GetDWDevil], these counties will convert as well. This power is available in the Intrigue Screen.

To build the strength of [Root.GetSocietyName], you must spread the influence of [Root.GetDWDevil] as far as it can reach. There is fertile ground within the realm where people seem... "open" to new ideas. Found a cultist cell there, and see it blossom.

Use the [Root.GetSocietyName] Infiltration power in the province by right-clicking the county shield. This will start your attempt to found a cell of cultists there. Successfully infiltrating the province will complete the mission.
Order a loyal acolyte of [Root.GetSocietyName] to secretly spread our influence in a target province.
A loyal acolyte is sent to found a cell of [Root.GetSocietyName] cultists in [Root.GetName]
A cell of cultists loyal to the Lord of Skulls is secretly operating in this county.
A cell of cultists loyal to Papa Nurgle is secretly operating in this county.
A cell of cultists loyal to the Architect of Fate is secretly operating in this county.
A cell of cultists loyal to the Prince of Pleasure is secretly operating in this county.
A cell of cultists loyal to the Ruinous Powers is secretly operating in this county.
In due time these dark seeds will blossom.
We can no longer safely operate in that area.
Our agent will report back about the progress of our conversion.

The Order of the Bleeding Heart is a organization composed by priests and priestesses devoted to Shallya, Goddess of Mercy and Healing. The core belief of all Shallyans is that they should work to relieve the suffering of others. As such, they devote their lifes to healing the diseased and doing charity work for the poor.
The Holy Matriarch of the Shallyans.
The Order of the Bleeding Heart
May the Mother of Mercy watch upon you
Removes all symptoms and minor diseases, has a chance to remove stronger diseases and perform a miracle.
Need to be wounded, maimed, have a disease or severe medical condition.
Though I suffer, Lady Shallya hears my plea, and through Her mercy, all my earthly ailments shall be removed. I am preparing a great ritual prayer to the Mother of Mercy and become like new.
May Shallya have mercy on me.
As the ritual is being finished I can feel my strength returning to me, purging the weakness that has been holding my body in a vice.
The light! The light! Praise Shallya! I can see again!
A miracle! My sword has returned to me! If this is not proof of the mercy of Shallya, I do not know what else it is!
What mercy Shallya displays! The pain of regrowth was immense, but I am restored!
The blessings of Shallya course through my veins, and I can already feel the filth of disease being forced from my body!
Shallya did no hear my plea. Why? Why o Lady of Mercy?
I feel the mercy of Shallya gracing me, closing wounds and knitting bone back together. I am blessed.
Despite my best efforts and Shallya's own blessings, my ailments have not healed completeyl.
Praise the Lady of Mercy!Tout sera comme [Root.GetDWDevil] le veut.
By invoking the power of Shallya, her Priesta can sometimes heal even the most grievous injuries.
Enables §Gright-clicking§! on your character's portrait in order to perform a Lay on Hands to heal yourself, in exchange for §Y[Root.GetSocietyCurrency]§!.

[Root.GetMOGreeting], [Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName]

Bringing the aid to those in need to others is among the holiest of Shallyan duties. Therefore we ask of you to construct a new hospital in your lands so your subjects may have somewhere to bring their diseased and treat their illnesses.

[Root.GetMOFarewell],
Signed, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]

Blessed [Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName].

We are pleased to hear that you have completed the construction of a new hospital in [FromFromFromFrom.GetName]. It should go a long way to help those in need of aid, in [Root.Religion.GetHighGodNameCap]'s name
Signed [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetOnlyDynastyName]

To every member of the [Root.Society.GetName], the hospital is like a second home. We come here to help those in need and worship Shallya, in our own way. Building a new hospital will offer a safe harbor for the local population and act as an outpost of Her Mercy, an outstretched hand to those in need of our aid.
To complete this mission, build a hospital holding in a county in your realm.

The Order of Mysteries is one of the few formal organisations dedicated to Verena, goddess of Learning, Knowledge, and Justice. The order is dedicated to the recovery of lost and forgotten lore, and uncovering suppressed knowledge. Sometimes this search takes place in the depths of musty libraries, other times in distant ruins or haunted tombs.

Greetings [Root.GetTitledFirstName]!
We are delighted to learn that you have taken your first step towards higher learning. The Goddess Verena always welcomes new adepts willing to share wisdom with each other.

Go with the Owl, for She will show you the way to knowledge.
Signed, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]
Constructing your own library will help you in the search of knowledge spoused by the Goddess Verena and the Order of Mysteries...
A truly useful Library can take both time and money to assemble but without an office dedicated to study I doubt I will ever be able to unveil the higher learnings of Verena.
On second thought, there are more pressing matters.

Secrecy is of great importance as the knowledge I will seek after in my library may both frighten the ignorant and tantalize my fellow Verenans. To keep intruders away libraries are often built deep within a castle, but a more accessible building would likely be more efficient...
My secrets will be safe deep within the walls of [Root.Capital.Capital.GetName]!
The plans for your library will have to fit into your existing castle.
Let us build an efficient and accessible office for research!
The plans for your library will only be dictated by what is most efficient but your secrets will not be as well guarded.
Let us build a guarded compound on an island.
Let us build a remote guarded compound.
Though isolated your library can be as big as it needs to be.

In order to properly test all the theories studied in my library, I require a setup of furnaces of differing temperature and flames of different types. The Verenan texts speak of various setups that could be beneficial.
A modest setup with one furnace will be enough.
[Root.GetFullName] will aim for a small but functional laboratory.
I can work around a small but varied setup.
[Root.GetFullName] will aim to build a laboratory that can handle somewhat more complicated procedures.
I will require a state of the art laboratory!
[Root.GetFullName] will aim to build an advanced laboratory, capable of handling a number of complicated procedures.
I will aim higher than any of those that have come before me!
[Root.GetFullName] will build an experimental setup with as many furnaces, basins, and other contraptions as can reasonably be fitted.

The glass in which I keep my concoctions is brittle and breaks easily. This may be tolerable for beakers and other dispensible glass but earlier today a giant alembic shattered into a thousand pieces after having been heated carelessly by one of my helpers...
Let us try to limit their use then.
[Root.GetFullName] will keep buying glass of inferior quality but helpers will be instructed to handle it with extreme care from now on.
We must only every buy the most expensive and durable glass.
[Root.GetFullName] will from now on spend more to ensure all glass that enter the library is as durable and clear as possible.

Not all pottery is suited for the kind of alchemical work I do. My experiments require both the porous orange pottery that can absorb components in the crucible and the dark and highly fire resistant pots in which even the strongest metal can be melted. Good quality does come at a high price however...
In time locals will rise to this challenge.
[Root.GetFullName] will keep the library supplied using the pottery from local potters to avoid the high price of imported crucibles.
[Root.GetFullName] will now only tolerate the best of imported pottery from master potters.

The local smiths do not seem to appreciate the great care that must be taken to create the kind of tools we need to work the fires of my laboratory. Perhaps in time they will learn but so far the results have been most disappointing.
[Root.GetFullName] will cut costs by relying on local smiths to produce the tools and other ironwork required for [Root.GetHerHis] alchemical experiments.
Мы должны импортировать необходимые нам инструменты.
[Root.GetFullName] will import alchemical tools from the master smiths that are best skilled to make them.

Finally, the most important part of any library ( and specially, those of the Verenans ), the book collection. Any proper devotee of Verena has a sizable number of books, ranging many areas of knowledge.
Книги, которые у меня есть будут достаточны.
[Root.GetFullName] will avoid spending money frivolously on books that tell [Root.GetHerHis] what he already knows.
Мои слуги не успокоятся, пока у нас не будет такой коллекции.
[Root.GetFullName] will ensure the success of [Root.GetHerHis] future theories by having a reference library for all occassions.

It may not be the most advanced office of learning, in fact it might well be the opposite of that, but I have finally completed a library in which to conduct my studies. Soon, the Owl will show me the way to knowledge!

In order to conduct their studies in an efficient way this character has constructed a small library. It is not the most impressive of office but it has the necessities needed to study and test many theories.

The work to create an office in which I can conduct my studies is finally complete! It may not compare to the greatest libraries of this age but it will surely help me find the knowledge which I seek.
In order to conduct their studies in an efficient way this character has constructed a library. It has the basic necessities needed to study and test many theories.
My library is finally completed. Will it be able to fulfill my dreams of enlightenment, in the name of Goddess Verena? Only time will tell...

This character has spent considerable time and money to build a library where they can pursue knowledge to it's fullest. The setup has attracted some attention from others and is the envy of poorer dabblers in the sciences.

After months of hard work and a considerable amount of money spent, the library of [Root.GetFullName] is the envy of anyone who wishes to the delve into the deeper mysteries of Verena. This office of learning allows the [Root.GetTitle] to study about any subject that's far been documented and is a testament to [Root.GetHerHis] great ambitions in the field.

This character has spent both time and a small fortune to construct a proper office where Verenan studies can be learnt. This library is built to be able to handle any experiment currently documented and employs a small team of helpers to keep all the books properly at any times.

With no expenses spared and under the constant supervision of [Root.GetFullName] a house unlike any other has been erected to realize the dream of a perfect Verenan working environment. Many of the contraptions have been conceived and drawn by the [Root.GetTitle] personally and the great number of furnaces alone employs a team of helpers from all the entire realm.\n\nThe office now stands ready to allow [Root.GetFullName] to uncover the secrets of the world, all it requires is for its master to give the instructions.

Equal parts brilliance, deep pockets and rigorous discipline has allowed this character to build a palace of the Verenan arts. This library is not only large in size it is pioneering a number of new theories in the name of Goddess Verena
You must construct a library in which your studies to uncover the hidden mysteries of the world can be undertaken.
To complete this mission, activate the decision §Y'Build a Library'§! in the Intrigue menu and successfully complete the construction of a Library.

To [Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName],

It has come to my attention that you still lack a proper office of learning! Even I cannot understand how you can hope to uncover the mysteries of Verena, without the proper books or staff. My library is the envy of any learned man and has over time become a second home. You should seek to emulate me or your work will fade into obscurity.

Follow the Owl.
Signed, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]

To [Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName],

Master, I feel we are both held back by the lack of a proper office of learning. If we are to uncover the mysteries of Verena, we will need the proper books and work space. Unless you build a library or our work here will fade into obscurity.

Follow the Owl.
Signed, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]

With a library of my own I can proceed to study greater mysteries than ever before. How I ever got by without a dedicated workspace and the right tools I will never understand. The mysteries of Verena are within reach!

My new library is the envy of both those that now live and all that came before me. I dare say even [Root.GetHermesThriceBlessed], himself would be impressed by the setup I now employ to uncover the hidden secrets of matter and spirit.

To [Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName],

I must say, dear colleague, I cannot fathom how you get along without a proper assistant! My own is both bright and obedient. Not once have I detected the stench of alcohol upon [From.GetHerHisOpp] breath. Take my advice and find an apprentice of your own.

Follow the Owl.
Signed, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]

Over the past months, the thought of an apprentice has been at the forefront of my mind. I have considered my advisors, but I dare say not one of them seem fit for the role. However, one of my servants has caught my eye. [From.GetFirstName] is an attentive [From.GetManWoman] with a quick mind.
У меня хорошее предчувствие! вместе с моим учеником [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName], я точно раскрою многие секреты. Возможно, я даже напишу великую работу Верины, Magnum opus!

[From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]'s apprenticeship has reached its end. [From.GetSheHeCap] knows enough to be acknowledged as a Verenan scholar in [From.GetHerHis] own rights. As a parting gift, I gave [From.GetHerHim] a tome containing a few of my most well-guarded secrets. I did not pretend to notice the tears in [From.GetHerHis] eyes, but they touched me deeply.

To [Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName],

My [Root.GetSisterBrother], I have a proposal which might interest you. An old letter detailing the possible locations of some lost writings came into my possession not many moons ago. If you fund an expedition, we can search for these treasures together!

Follow the Owl.
Signed, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]

To [Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName],
The letter mentioned three lost texts: a tome in a local antiquary, a scroll hidden in a temple in [temple_site.GetName], and a tablet in the ancient library ruins of [ruin_site.GetName] in [ruin_site.Holder.TopLiege.PrimaryTitle.GetName]. The further we venture, in distance as well as into the past, the greater secrets we might uncover. The choice is yours.

Signed, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]

To [Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName],
I have the best of news! Since our last correspondence I have acquired a map leading to a surviving chamber of the great library in ! While the previous options remain — a tome here in [Root.Capital.GetName], a scroll in [temple_site.GetName] and tablet in [ruin_site.Holder.TopLiege.PrimaryTitle.GetName] — I would argue that this opportunity is too great to pass up.

Signed, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]
You and §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! set off on an expedition to , hoping to find the ruins of the Great Library.\n
You and §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! set off on an expedition to [ruin_site.GetName], hoping to find a tablet in the ruins there.\n
It seems like the best option is the scroll in [temple_site.GetName].
You and §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! set off on an expedition to [temple_site.GetName], hoping to find a scroll in a temple there.\n
I do not have much to spare... Surely the local antiquary will do?
You and §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! and set off to a local antiquarian in search for an old tome.\n

When we found the engraved door to the chamber, we could hardly believe our eyes. [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName] and I had nearly given up. That day would be the very last of our search, we had decided, so our discovery must surely have been a divine miracle! My hands were shaking as I, alongside the servants, cleared the last rubble and heaved the door open.\n\nLantern held high over our heads, my colleague and I entered first. The faint light fell on countless pots and chests, elaborate wall paintings and a great forge. Something else reflected the light from deep within the chamber, something vibrantly green... [From.GetFirstName]'s breaths were quick and shallow. 'It.... it cannot be!'
Finally, the deepest secrets of Hermes Trismegistus shall be mine!

Our expedition into foreign lands encountered some difficulties, but in the end we made it to the ruins of [ruin_site.GetName] safely. After a fortnight of excavation the servants uncovered the entrance to a hidden underground chamber. [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName] and I entered side by side, the air heavy with excitement.
Do my eyes deceive me, or are those symbols Nehekharan?

The bribe we offered the priest of [temple_site.GetName] was enough to make [temple_site.Holder.GetHerHim] unlock the inner chambers of the temple. We examined every nook and cranny for clues of the scroll's hiding place. On the fifth day, one of the servants announced [Root.GetSheHe] had found a hidden chamber...

[From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName] and I searched every shelf and chest in the dusty old shop. For days on end we did nothing but breathe dust and leaf through boring old texts. They were all full of nonsense! On the fourth day, I was thus incredibly surprised to lay my eyes on the Owl, the symbol of Verena!
I think I found the tome, [From.GetFirstName]!

My misgivings arose early after our arrival in , but [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName] insisted that we must have misinterpreted the map. After every failure, [From.GetSheHe] had a new idea. A suspicion crept upon me... What if the map was forged, and [From.GetFirstName] knew? Was the blasted expedition a plot to ruin me?!

Our expedition into foreign lands certainly encountered its fair share of difficulties. We dealt with everything from unfavorable weather to lame horses, but in the end, the fraudulent guide was the nail in the coffin. When [Root.GetSheHe] escaped with our last gold, we also discovered that we were in the wrong part of [ruin_site.Holder.TopLiege.PrimaryTitle.GetName]!

The bribe we offered the priest of [temple_site.GetName] was enough to make [temple_site.Holder.GetHerHim] unlock the inner chambers of the temple. We examined every nook and cranny for clues of the scroll's hiding place. After a week of nothing more interesting than the discovery of a stash of lewd letters, we had to admit defeat.

[From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName] and I searched every shelf and chest in the dusty old shop. For days at end we did nothing but breathe dust and page through boring old texts. They were all full of nonsense! After a week, we had to admit defeat. We would never uncover anything of worth in this place.

Your colleague [FromFrom.GetSocietyRank] [FromFrom.GetFirstName] has found a letter detailing the possible locations of some great old works. A deal has been struck — [FromFrom.GetSocietyRank] [FromFrom.GetFirstName] shall share the contents of the letter with you, and you shall fund the expedition.
If §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! sets out on one of the expeditions suggested by §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! and finds an ancient text, the mission is completed.

To [Root.GetFromThisHermeticsRank] [Root.GetFirstName],

[infiltration_target.GetSocietyRank] [infiltration_target.GetFirstName] is a pompous, featherbrained scoundrel — you know it to be true, [Root.GetSisterBrother]! It is time for [infiltration_target.GetHerHim] to pay for [infiltration_target.GetHerHis] sins. Let us ruin [infiltration_target.GetHerHis] library and steal [infiltration_target.GetHerHis] secrets!

Follow the Owl.
Signed, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]

To [Root.GetFromThisHermeticsRank] [Root.GetFirstName],

My friend, we have a common nemesis. You know of whom I speak — the despicable idiot [infiltration_target.GetSocietyRank] [infiltration_target.GetFirstName]! The thought of [infiltration_target.GetHerHim] being a member of our respectable Order... it makes me sick! Let us ruin [infiltration_target.GetHerHis] library and steal [infiltration_target.GetHerHis] secrets!

Follow the Owl.
Signed, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]

To [Root.GetFromThisHermeticsRank] [Root.GetFirstName],

[infiltration_target.GetSocietyRank] [infiltration_target.GetFirstName] is a greedy, slothful idiot who deserves none of the riches in [infiltration_target.GetHerHis] possession. What do you say, [Root.GetSisterBrother] — shall we raid [infiltration_target.GetHerHis] library and claim that which should be ours?

Follow the Owl.

Signed, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]

The greedy and paranoid [FromFrom.GetSocietyRank] [FromFrom.GetFirstName] guards [FromFrom.GetHerHis] secrets jealously. A most shameful behavior, indeed! Unlike [FromFrom.GetHerHim], you know how to share. In the spirit of collaboration, you and a colleague has agreed to infiltrate [FromFrom.GetFirstName]'s library and either steal or destroy anything of value. Perhaps you will do both!
Your colleague will bring you to the library of §Y[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]§!. If you manage to steal or destroy anything and get away unnoticed, the mission is completed.

Most esteemed [Root.GetFromThisHermeticsRank] [Root.GetFirstName],

Yet my spies have not found the exact location of [infiltration_target.GetSocietyRank] [infiltration_target.GetFirstName]'s library. You need not worry, friend, for they have some promising leads. We will just have to be patient.

Follow the Owl.
Signed, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]
I shall prepare for a swift departure.
As soon as the spies of §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! has located the library, you will depart.

[infiltration_target.GetSocietyRank] [infiltration_target.GetFirstName] must be paranoid, for [infiltration_target.GetHerHis] library is a fortress hidden away on a remote island. As we cross the dark waters under the cover of night, [From.GetFirstName] tells me about the guard rotation. We will only have one chance to breach the defenses.

[infiltration_target.GetSocietyRank] [infiltration_target.GetFirstName] has hidden [infiltration_target.GetHerHis] library deep in the dungeons of [infiltration_target.Capital.GetName]. [From.GetFirstName] and I have passed unnoticed so far thanks to the intelligence [From.GetHerHis] spies provided, but the last door is heavily guarded.

It was not hard to locate [infiltration_target.GetSocietyRank] [infiltration_target.GetFirstName]'s library, [From.GetFirstName] tells me as we enter the [infiltration_target.Capital.GetHolding]. 'While old [infiltration_target.GetFirstName] has no talent for keeping secrets, [infiltration_target.GetSheHe] does know how to hire proper guards,' [From.GetSheHe] continues, telling me about the obstacle ahead.
I have a way with people and a heavy purse.
I prepared a potion of dreamless sleep for this very eventuality.
Attempt to drug the guards with a potion of your own making.\n
You distract them, and I will enter the library.

§Y[infiltration_companion.GetTitledFirstName]§! attempts to distract the guards. You will have to perform any theft or sabotage yourself once inside, which limits the amount of damage you may accomplish.\n
Actually, I have changed my mind...
This is a bad idea. You retreat to the safety of your [Root.Capital.GetHolding].\n

As we step out of the shadows, the guards draw their blades. Their posture and faces change as I pull the heavy purse from my pocket. After a short exchange of words and coins, [infiltration_companion.GetSocietyRank] [infiltration_companion.GetFirstName] and I enter through the heavy door. 'What now, [Root.GetSisterBrother]? What course of action would you recommend?'

By some miracle, [infiltration_companion.GetSocietyRank] [infiltration_companion.GetFirstName] manages to empty the little vial of potion in a jug before it is brought to the guards. Within a quarter of an hour, they are snoring softly. 'We must hurry — the sedating effect won't last forever,' I whisper as we sneak past. 'What now, [Root.GetSisterBrother]?' [infiltration_companion.GetFirstName] asks once we are inside.
If you focus on destruction, I will search for items of value.
You split up to cover more ground. Effective, but riskier.\n
Let me take care of sabotage. Collect anything useful you come across.
Help me find where [infiltration_target.GetFirstName] keeps [infiltration_target.GetHerHis] valuables.
You stay together. Safer, but not as effective.\n
Our goal is maximum damage. Let's get started!

First, everything went so well. By some miracle, [infiltration_companion.GetFirstName] managed to empty the little vial of potion in a jug before it was brought to the guards. That was half an hour ago! The guards are showing no signs of drowsiness and our time is running out. I whisper apologies as we leave, but [infiltration_companion.GetFirstName] does not answer.
That recipe never failed me before, I swear...

I had my doubts, but color me impressed! [infiltration_companion.GetFirstName] managed to lure the guards away by setting off an alchemical reaction producing the foulest of odors! While the trick was effective, to say the least, I do not know how much time I have. I need to focus. What should I do next?
I shall steal [infiltration_target.GetFirstName]'s rarest ingredients and most secret tomes!
My focus will be maximum destruction. Where is the fire steel...?

I have seen many foolish things in my days, but [infiltration_companion.GetFirstName]'s poor attempt at a distraction might just take the prize. I am dumbstruck as [infiltration_companion.GetSheHe] rattles [infiltration_companion.GetHerHis] blade against the wall and begins to wail loudly! When the guards footsteps draw near, I grab [infiltration_companion.GetHerHim] and run. 'Really, a ghost? No one in their right mind would fall for that!'
There will be no second attempt tonight. Not in a long, long time.

Just as I am about to pour acid over [infiltration_target.GetFirstName]'s notes, the door opens behind me. I whirl around and find myself facing none other but the guards. Our eyes lock for a moment before I drop the acid and run, but it is pointless. Despite the lingering effects of the sleeping potion, they are still faster than me.

Just as I am about to pour acid over [infiltration_target.GetFirstName]'s notes, the door opens behind me. I whirl around and find myself staring into the panicked eyes of [infiltration_companion.GetFirstName]. A split second later, I notice the guards holding [infiltration_companion.GetHerHim]. 'Run!' [infiltration_companion.GetSheHe] shouts, but it is too late.

My hands are deep in one of [infiltration_target.GetFirstName]'s big ingredient chests when the door opens behind me. I whirl around and find myself facing none other but the guards. Our eyes lock for a moment before I drop the acid and run, but it is pointless. Despite the lingering effects of the potion, they are still faster than me.

My hands are deep in one of [infiltration_target.GetFirstName]'s big ingredient chests when the door opens behind me. I whirl around and find myself staring into the panicked eyes of [infiltration_companion.GetFirstName]. A split second later, I notice the guards holding [infiltration_companion.GetHerHim]. 'Run!' [infiltration_companion.GetSheHe] shouts, but it is too late.
Release me! I'm a colleague of your [infiltration_target.GetMasterMistress]!

It seems like my guards have caught a couple of ugly fishes! Apparently [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName], along with [From.GetHerHis] accomplice [infiltration_companion.GetFirstName], made an attempt to enter my library and steal my secrets. This insult cannot go unanswered...
Perhaps [From.GetFirstName] is willing to trade a few secrets for [From.GetHerHis] freedom.
Leave them in the dungeon. I will deal with them later...
§Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! refuses to share [From.GetHerHis] secrets and stays imprisoned.

I have reached the point where I am willing to shamelessly beg for water when the guards drag me from my cell. I must have fainted, for the next thing I see is [From.GetFirstName]'s scornful face! 'Well, well, well... My guards have caught one laughable crook, indeed!' After some further insults, [From.GetSheHe] offers me my freedom in exchange for some of my deepest secret knowledge.
Give me some water and then I will tell you whatever you wish to know.
You will never be worthy of my secrets!

I barely recognized [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName] as they dragged [From.GetHerHim] towards me. A few days in the dungeons does that to people, I hear. I am sure I could have asked for [From.GetHerHis] firstborn, so eager was [From.GetSheHe] to have [From.GetHerHis] freedom. [From.GetFirstName] filled notebook after notebook under my stern gaze.
This will be an interesting read, indeed.

I barely recognized [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName] as they dragged [From.GetHerHim] towards me. A few days in the dungeons does that to people, I hear. It seems like [From.GetSheHe] enjoyed [From.GetHerHis] cell, however, for when I told [From.GetHerHim] of my generous offer, I got nothing but insults and curses in return.

I have reached the point where I am willing to shamelessly beg for water when the guards drag me from my cell. I must have fainted, for the next thing I see is [From.GetFirstName]'s scornful face! 'Well, well, well... My guards have caught one laughable crook, indeed! I just wanted to have a look at you before they throw away the key...'
Mercy, mercy! I can't return to that place!

Who knew the library of [infiltration_target.GetSocietyRank] [infiltration_target.GetFirstName] would be such a treasure trove? In addition to some rare ingredients and a few items which will fetch good coin in the shadier parts of [Root.Capital.GetName], I came across a most interesting text!

My search has been most rewarding. [infiltration_target.GetSocietyRank] [infiltration_target.GetFirstName]'s ingredient cabinet has a fine assortment of substances and I have found several nuggets of precious metal. My share of the spoils will be a fine addition to my own library!

For all [infiltration_target.GetHerHis] talk and boasting, I expected more than this. Or, perhaps, [infiltration_target.GetSocietyRank] [infiltration_target.GetFirstName] is more paranoid than I thought. In any case, I cannot find anything of great value. At least these nuggets of metal will sell for a few coins.
It is better than nothing, I guess.

If I ever find out who broke into my library, I will kill that vile crook! Not only have my ingredient cabinet and metal collection been pilfered, but my most valued text is gone! My most divine knowledge, my deepest secrets! May the thief rot in hell!

If I ever find out who broke into my library, I will kill that vile crook! Not only has the thief laid its dirty hands on my precious metals, but my ingredient cabinet has been ransacked also. The culprit must be another follower of the Hermetic arts!

I should really look over the security of my lab. Last night, some vile snook past the guards, but luckily nothing of major value was stolen. Either the thief had no idea of how valuable my ingredients and tomes are, or they were too dumb to find them. The precious metals will cost a fair bit to replace, though.

[infiltration_target.GetSocietyRank] [infiltration_target.GetFirstName] should really hide [infiltration_target.GetHerHis] gunpowder better! Within half an hour I have compiled enough materials to craft a decent bomb. Considering the many barrels of volatile substances, this should be enough to ruin the library. I light the fuse and run.

Thankfully, a library is not particularly hard to sabotage. The place is full of acids, volatile substances and old tomes dry as bones. While I do not feel confident enough to risk a great fire, I heave the texts into the furnace and set the ablaze!

[infiltration_target.GetSocietyRank] [infiltration_target.GetFirstName] should really hide [infiltration_target.GetHerHis] gunpowder better! Within half an hour I have compiled enough materials to craft a decent bomb. I assemble the parts ever so slowly because my hands will not stop shaking. Just as I am about to perform the last step, I drop a vial. I freeze.
Excellent! It will take [infiltration_target.GetFirstName] months, if not years, to recover!

If I ever find out who broke into my library, I will kill that vile crook! I woke last night as the whole keep shook violently. It seems like someone entered my library and set off an explosion! Luckily, no lives were harmed, but my library is in ruins. There is nothing to save.

If I ever find out who broke into my library, I will kill that vile crook! It seems as if I have made an enemy, for the intruder focused on destruction rather than theft. Acid has been poured on floors and across work surfaces, pots and glass have been shattered and, worst of all, my furnace is filled with the blackened pages of burnt books!

I am not sure whether I should be disturbed or amused! This morning, a charred corpse was discovered in my library. Apparently the crook broke in to sabotage my work but managed to kill [From.GetHerselfHimself] in a botched attempt to craft a bomb. I examined the body and the culprit was none other than [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetSocietyName]!

I find [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName] with [From.GetHerHis] hands deep in a big ingredients chest. Our eyes meet and I nod. It is time to go. [From.GetFirstName] stuff a few more vials and nuggets of metal into [From.GetHerHis] satchel before running after me.

I follow the trail of overturned chests and broken vials until I find [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]. I gesture for [From.GetHerHim] to come with me — it is time to go. [From.GetSheHeCap] stuffs [From.GetHerHis] pockets with a few nearby tools before running after me.

As I close my satchel, I hear a loud crash from the other room. As I peek through the doorway, the scene before me is impressive. The warm light of [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]'s torch illuminates the destruction. Overturned tables, torn books and smashed instruments. I nod appreciatively. 'It is time to leave.'
I wish I could see [infiltration_target.GetFirstName]'s face when [infiltration_target.GetSheHe] realizes what we've done!

As I reach for a nearby tome, a terrifying roar sweeps through the library and the floor shudders underneath my feet. Images of dragons and chimeras flash through my mind before the truth hits me. [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName] must have set of an explosion. There is no time look for [From.GetHerHim].
No one could have slept through that. I have to run!

Once we have left the library far behind us, [infiltration_companion.GetFirstName] and I collapse, two bundles of sweaty and shivering limbs. We did it. We really did it, and we got away with it, too! As the laugh erupts from my lips, my body finally relaxes. Next to me, [infiltration_companion.GetFirstName] heavy breathing turns into a merry chuckle.

Наконец то! I have produced [Root.GetTheoryPaperQuality] paper on the ideal of law! It explores the concept and spirit of the law and how it shapes the life of Men. Now all that is left is to submit it to my verenan peers, for review.

It is finished! I have produced [Root.GetTheoryPaperQuality] paper on the ideal of justice! It explores the concept and spirit of the justice. Now all that is left is to submit it to my verenan peers, for review.

It is finished! I have produced [Root.GetTheoryPaperQuality] paper on the Wisdom of Verena! It explores the mysteries of the owl that permeates this world, and might provide a new insight into knowledge as a whole. Now all that is left is to submit it to my verenan peers, for review.

It is finished! I have produced [Root.GetTheoryPaperQuality] paper on hieroglyphic translation! It explores the hidden meaning in these ancient Nehekharan texts, which might in turn provide a new insight into history. Now all that is left is to submit it to my verenan peers, for review.

It is finished! I have produced [Root.GetTheoryPaperQuality] paper on chemistry! It explores new methods of the process, which might enable the creation of a variety of new alchemical elixirs. Now all that is left is to submit it to my verenan peers, for review.

It is finished! I have produced [Root.GetTheoryPaperQuality] paper on fermentation! It explores new approaches to the process, which might enable the creation of a variety of exciting new alchemical elixirs. Now all that is left is to submit it to my verenan peers, for review.

It is finished! I have produced [Root.GetTheoryPaperQuality] paper on the mysterious Elixir of Life! It explores the concept, both as a damning source for life eternal and how it caused the fall of Nehekhara. Now all that is left is to submit it to my verenan peers, for review.

It is finished! I have produced [Root.GetTheoryPaperQuality] paper on warpstone! It explores the nature of this heretical material, and its fell powers of mutation. Now all that is left is to submit it to my verenan peers, for review.

It is finished! I have produced [Root.GetTheoryPaperQuality] paper on the planets! It explores astrology, in particular the movement of the planets, and what this could be interpreted as. Now all that is left is to submit it to my verenan peers, for review.

It is finished! I have produced [Root.GetTheoryPaperQuality] paper on the aether! It explores astrology, in particular the constellations, and what truths they contain. Now all that is left is to submit it to my verenan peers, for review.

It is finished! I have produced [Root.GetTheoryPaperQuality] paper on Mannslieb! It explores astrology, and in particular the movement and importance of this heavenly body. Now all that is left is to submit it to my verenan peers, for review.

It is finished! I have produced [Root.GetTheoryPaperQuality] paper on the Sun! It explores astrology, and in particular the movement and importance of this heavenly body. Now all that is left is to submit it to my verenan peers, for review.
I will send it out, at once!

A few days ago, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName] told me that [From.GetSheHe] had written a paper on the ideal of law, and handed me a copy to review. Reading through it, it is apparent that [Root.GetTheoryPaperQualityExpanded] Do I see fit to endorse it, however?

A few days ago, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName] told me that [From.GetSheHe] had written a paper on the ideal of justice, and handed me a copy to review. Reading through it, it is apparent that [Root.GetTheoryPaperQualityExpanded] Do I see fit to endorse it, however?

A few days ago, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName] told me that [From.GetSheHe] had written a paper on warpstone, and handed me a copy to review. Reading through it, it is apparent that [Root.GetTheoryPaperQualityExpanded] Do I see fit to endorse it, however?

A few days ago, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName] told me that [From.GetSheHe] had written a paper on the importance of the planets, and handed me a copy to review. Reading through it, it is apparent that [Root.GetTheoryPaperQualityExpanded] Do I see fit to endorse it, however?

A few days ago, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName] told me that [From.GetSheHe] had written a paper on the astrological importance of Mannslieb, and handed me a copy to review. Reading through it, it is apparent that [Root.GetTheoryPaperQualityExpanded] Do I see fit to endorse it, however?

Submite your life's work for the Order of Mysteries, as part of the order's Mysterious Volumes, a series of journals detailing the exploints and findings of all Verenan scholars.
